description: With a focus on southern Ontario, this mapbook features topographic maps with elevation relief shading to help visualize terrain features. Use it to navigate backcountry roads and trails, paddling routes and portages, summer and winter recreation areas, and parks and recreation sites. Includes UTM grids with latitude and longitude bearing. Map area includes Bruce Peninsula, Kitchener-Waterloo, Hamilton, London, Niagara Falls, Owen Sound, Toronto, Wasaga Beach, and Windsor.
name: Backroad Mapbooks Southern Ontario
